org.hypergraphdb.viewer

Class HGVKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hypergraphdb.viewer.HGVKit

  • public abstract class HGVKit
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class containing common methods, constants and event handling for wiring the desktop version of HGViewer
